FuncDef:
The arp fast-reply disable command disables ARP fast reply.
The undo arp fast-reply disable command enables ARP fast reply. The arp fast-reply disable command disables ARP fast reply. The undo arp fast-reply disable command enables ARP fast reply. By default, ARP fast reply is enabled.
ExtraInfo: When a device functions as an access gateway, it needs to process a large number of ARP request packets. As a result, the ARP response speed is slow. To speed up the response to ARP request packets, run the undo arp fast-reply disable command to enable ARP fast reply on the device.
